sentences.sContent: Red squirrels cut conifer cones from trees and bury them in plant litter on the forest floor.
sentences.sContent_eng: Red squirrels cut conifer cones from trees and bury them in plant litter on the forest floor.
sentences.sCn: 红松鼠会将针叶树上的果实割下来，然后埋在森林地面的落叶中。

trans.tranCn: 针叶树；[植] 松柏科植物
trans.tranOther: a tree such as a  pine  or  fir  that has leaves like needles and produces brown  cones  that contain seeds. Most types of conifer keep their leaves in winter.
